short_description: glenshane country house is a bed and breakfast based in maghera, united kingdom.
long_description: this luxurious accommodation is set in rural mid ulster overlooking the sperrin mountains and only 45 mins from belfast international airport and ferry terminals. glenshane country house is less than 5 min drive from ireland's highest bar and restaurant 'the ponderosa'. easy access to the seamus heaney home place, portrush beach, the giant's causeway, epic 'game of thrones' film locations and other scenic drives.
business_tags: self catering accommodation | bars and restaurants | luxury vacation rentals | self catering holidays | panoramic views | luxury accommodation | self catering | green pastures | land animals | epic games | interactive fun
generated_description: glenshane country house is a 5-star self-catering accommodation located in rural mid ulster, northern ireland. the property is situated at the top of the glenshaney pass, overlooking the sperrin mountains, and is less than a 5 minute drive from ireland's highest bar and restaurant, the ponderosa. the house is well-equipped with every amenity one can expect from a luxury vacation rental, including a spacious kitchen stocked with necessities and a bountiful welcome basket of delicious bread, cereal, cheese, and snacks. the spacious windows offer panoramic views of the pastoral landscape and the peaceful green pastures of baby lambs calling out their mothers. guests can enjoy walks along quiet, lush country roads and trekking with sheep and birds along the way.
generated_business_tags: self-catering accommodations | luxury vacation rental properties | spacious kitchen | welcome basket | bread, cereals, and snacks
